page.title: 06Flowers around Tongue School
page.content: Primaries 1 - 4 4xamined a 4 m2 plot in the school grounds. 'It was a very hot day and we were wearing T shirts. We found lots of daisies and there were millions of flowers on the whins. My collecting tub was full with mosses and grasses. I saw a big beetle. Alan picked it up with two tubs and took it into the classroom and put it into the sink. We found narrow leaved plantain, dand elion, ragwort, mouse-eared chickweed,and hawkweed.There were lots of grasses which I didn't know.We went into the woods and onto the football pitch. The last ones I saw were butter cups, sedge, clover, bird's foot trefoil,tormentil and bracken. Later in the summer there will be more wild flowers to see.'
